name: Meltdown: Out of Control
description:
*Has controller support for everything but the main menu*

-Several bugs have been noted, but due to the deadline are currently unable to be patched.  This includes the music and the ending "cutscene."

My submission to the 2020 GMTK Game Jam, and my first full game.   The theme was out of control, so you play as a physics based slime where the only control you have is a nudge in the air.  To expand on the theme, your goal is to stop a reaction that scientists have lost control of.

Character Animation, Programming - Alex (BoomBox5/me)

Tileset, Environment Animations - Morgan (SirMilkman)

Music - Timmy
